camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Wide-angle Aerial Drone Shot, 45Â° Bird's eye view, Establishing cityscape shot
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 24mm Wide-angle lens, Rectilinear projection, High sharpness edge-to-edge, Slight perspective compression bringing the background skyline closer
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharp details from foreground  to background

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Early Twilight / Soft Sunset (Sun is behind clouds), Magic Hour transition
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Soft Diffuse Global Illumination (GI), No harsh directional sunlight, Wrap-around soft light, Low contrast lighting
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Partly cloudy with pastel colored clouds (Pink/Lavender/Soft Blue), Hazy atmosphere adding depth to the sky, Gentle visibility
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Very soft ambient occlusion, Faint cast shadows (almost non-existent), Diffuse shading on building facades

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Minimal to None (Daylight dominant), Faint reflection of sky on glass, No active artificial interior lights
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Natural reflection of the pink/purple sky on glass curtain walls, Vertical metallic fins catching the soft ambient skylight, No artificial LED strips active

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural daylight/twilight only, Street lights are OFF, No light trails
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Natural soft lighting on tree canopies, Lush green tones appearing slightly desaturated due to lower light levels

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Pastel Aesthetic, Soft Pink/Lavender/Baby Blue Sky vs Neutral Silver/Grey Architecture, Low Saturation
color_and_grading.temperature: Neutral balanced (5500K) with a distinct Magenta/Pink Tint (Tint +10), Soft Cool Shadows
color_and_grading.post_processing: Low Contrast, Matte finish (lifted shadows), Soft bloom on sky highlights, Pastel color grading, Clean and airy look

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: Corona Renderer (focus on soft skylight), V-Ray 6, Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Aerial Urban Photography, Fine Art Cityscape
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, High fidelity textures on building facades (vertical louvers), Realistic cloud volume

environment_textures.ground_surface: Clean asphalt roads (dry), Manicured green lawns, Concrete plazas with subtle texture
environment_textures.foliage_style: Dense urban greenery, Round tree canopies, Organized landscaping patterns
